create materialized view T1 as select sum(v2) as V from t where v1>1
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t1]) RwStreamProject(v=[$STREAM_NULL_BY_ROW_COUNT($0, $1)]) RwStreamAgg(group=[{}], agg#0=[COUNT()], v=[SUM($1)]) RwStreamFilter(condition=[>($0, 1)]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2])

create materialized view T2 as select v1+v2 as V from t
RwStreamMaterializedView(name=[t2]) RwStreamProject(v=[+($0, $1)], _row_id=[$2]) RwStreamTableSource(table=[[test_schema, t]], columns=[v1,v2,_row_id])
